sources.title: Night of the Blood Beast (1958)
sources.description: Classic low budget sci-fi complete with a reanimated dead astronaut impregnated with alien embryos and a blood-sucking space monster produced by Gene Corman. The monster suit was used again in "Teenage Caveman".

sources.title: Night of the Blood Beast (1958) ROGER CORMANüçï SCI-FI CLASSIC
sources.description:
It's FRIGHT NIGHT @PizzaFLIX 
Starring: Michael Emmet, Angela Greene, Ed Nelson
Director: Bernard L. Kowalski
Producers: Roger Corman, Gene Corman

Explore this classic 1958 sci-fi horror gem produced by American International Pictures, known for its low-budget yet highly imaginative genre films of the era. Directed by Bernard L. Kowalski and produced by Gene Corman, this chilling tale dives into the mysterious aftermath of a rocket crash and the terrifying discovery of an alien lifeform that threatens humanity.

Featuring performances by Michael Emmet as the ill-fated astronaut, Angela Greene as Dr. Julie Benson, and John Baer as Steve Dunlap, the film blends Cold War paranoia with extraterrestrial suspense. With a story by Gene Corman and chilling creature effects, this cult favorite exemplifies the golden age of B-movie science fiction.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Whether you're a classic horror fan or a sci-fi aficionado, this atmospheric thriller offers a glimpse into 1950s cinematic fears and imagination. Dive into this eerie encounter and see why it remains a beloved part of mid-century genre cinema.

üîî Don‚Äôt forget to like, subscribe, and comment your thoughts on this vintage alien invasion thriller!

#NightOfTheBloodBeast #ClassicSciFi #1950sHorror #Rogercorman #Michael Emmet #SciFiCinema #PizzaFLIX #AmericanInternationalPictures #RetroSciFi #CreatureFeature

metadata.Plot: An astronaut returns from space dead. The base that recovered him is then cut off from the outside world by an alien. The revival of the dead astronaut, the death of a scientist, and the discovery of alien embryos inside the resurrected astronaut's body bodes ill for the survival of those trapped at the base and the rest of humanity.
metadata.Actors: Michael Emmet, Angela Greene, John Baer
